item.title: bcrypt hash
item.description: bcrypt is a good way to deal with password authentication. In PHP it is available via crypt with blowfish algorithm or a shortcut password_hash function current PHP versions are providing. Yii framework project templates are using bcrypt for handling passwords. Framework components are providing polyfills ensuring bcrypt is used correctly. bcrypt produces a compound hash that looks like the following: $2y$13$YUUgrko03UmNU/fe6gNcO.Hka4lrdRlkq0iJ5d4bv4fK.sKS.6jXu The string is always 60 characters long. 2y indicates algorithm.
